@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.con.name: cache
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.con.description: Specify if you want to use the internal cache to speed up your compilations or not

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: classes
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description: This mixin generate all the sugar classes like utilities for colors, fonts, margins, etc...

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: astNodesToString
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description:
This function just take an AST nodes array and returns the string version of it
with ";" when needed, etc...

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: radius
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description: This function allows you to get a border radius value depending on your theme config

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: width
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description: This function allows you to get a border width value depending on your theme config

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: color
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description: This function allows you to get a color value depending on your theme config.

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: depth
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description: This function allows you to get a depth (box-shadow) value depending on your theme config

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: noise
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description: This function allows you to get a noise effect image back.

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: family
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description: This function allows you to get a font family value depending on your theme config

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: margin
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description: This function allows you to get a margin value depending on your theme config

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: offsize
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description: This function allows you to get an offsize value depending on your theme config

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: opacity
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description: This function allows you to get an opacity value depending on your theme config

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: padding
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description: This function allows you to get a padding value depending on your theme config

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: scalable
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description:
This function allows you to get value that will be scaled using the "--s-scale" variable.
This allows you to make your components aware of classes like "s-scale-10", etc...

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: space
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description: This function allows you to get a space value depending on your theme config

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: theme
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description:
This function allows you to get a theme value using dot path like "font.family.default.font-family", etc...
Usually the best way to access theme config is to use dedicated functions/mixins like "sugar.margin", "sugar.font.family", etc...

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: value
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description:
This function allows you to get a theme value using dot path like "font.family.default.font-family", etc...
Usually the best way to access theme config is to use dedicated functions/mixins like "sugar.margin", "sugar.font.family", etc...
This function make the same as using the `sugar.theme` one with the parameter `return`set to "value"

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: var
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description:
This function allows you to get a theme value using dot path like "font.family.default.font-family", etc...
Usually the best way to access theme config is to use dedicated functions/mixins like "sugar.margin", "sugar.font.family", etc...
This function make the same as using the `sugar.theme` one with the parameter `return`set to "var"

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: transition
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description: This function allows you to get a transition value depending on your theme config

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.sug.name: abs
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.sug.description:
This mixin allows you to center an item using the absolute method. Here's the accepted alignements:

- <s-color="accent">top</s-color>: Align item to the top
- <s-color="accent">left</s-color>: Align item to the left
- <s-color="accent">right</s-color>: Align item to the right
- <s-color="accent">bottom</s-color>: Align item to the bottom
- <s-color="accent">center</s-color>: Align item to the center (x and y)
- <s-color="accent">center-x</s-color>: Align item to the center-x
- <s-color="accent">center-y</s-color>: Align item to the center-y

These values can be specified like "top right", "bottom center-x", etc...

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: classes
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description: This mixin generate the borders helpers like s-radius:20, etc...

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: radius
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description:
This mixin allows you to apply a border radius with a value coming
from the config.theme.border.radius stack like 10, 20, etc...

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: width
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description:
This mixin allows you to apply a border width with a value coming
from the config.theme.border.width stack like 10, 20, etc...

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: classes
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description: This mixin allows you to generate all the clearfix helper classes like s-clearfix:micro, etc...

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: clearfix
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description:
This mixin allows you to apply a clearfix depending on your preference. Here's are the clearfix methods available:
- overflow (default)
- facebook
- float
- micro
- after

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: classes
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description: This mixin allows you to generate all the colors helpers classes like s-tc:accent, etc...

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: color
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description:
This mixin allows you to (re)map the "current", "primary" and "secondary" color to any other colors you want like "accent", "success, "etc...""
Note that is you don't specify any "primary" and "secondary" color, these once will be set to the passed "current" color.

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: current
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description: This mixin allows you to (re)map the "current" color to another one you want like "accent", "success", etc...

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: docblocks
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description:
This mixin print the documentation docblocks for the colors
into your final css.

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: primary
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description: This mixin allows you to (re)map the "primary" virtual color to another like "complementary", "accent", etc...

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: remap
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description: This mixin allows you to (re)map a color to another one like saying you want the "warning" color as the "primary" one

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: classes
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description: This mixin allows you to print all the ui classes for listed in the theme config components

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: classes
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description: This mixin generate all the cusros helper classes like `.s-cursor:pointer` etc...

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: classes
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description: This mixin allows you to generate all the depth helper classes like s-depth:20, etc...

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: depth
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description:
This mixin allows you to apply a certain depth that are defined
in the config.theme.depth stack like 10, 20, etc...

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: rtl
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description: This mixin allows you to style an element when it is in an rtl scope

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: classes
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description: This mixin allows you to generate all the disabled helper classes like s-disabled

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: disabled
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description: This mixin allows you to apply a the disabled styling to any HTMLElement.

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: classes
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description: This mixin generate all the display helper classes like s-display:block, etc...

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: noise
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description: This mixin allows you to apply a noise effect on any HTMLElement using the svg turbulence filter.

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: classes
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description: This mixin allows you to generate all the clearfix helper classes like s-clearfix:micro, etc...

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: depth
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description:
This mixin allows you to apply a certain depth that are defined
in the config.theme.depth stack like 10, 20, etc...

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: classes
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description: This mixin generate all the flex helper classes like s-flex, s-flex:align-top, etc...

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: classes
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description: This mixin generate all the float helper classes like ```.s-float:left```, ```.s-float:right```, etc...

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: classes
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description: This mixin generate font helper classes like s-font:title, s-font:20, etc...

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: faces
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description:
This mixin generate all the @font-face needed depending on the declared
fonts in the config.theme.font.family stack

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: family
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description:
This mixin generate the css needed to apply a particular font in your css.
The font parameter accept any defined font family from the
config.theme.font.family stack

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: size
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description:
This mixin generate the css needed to apply a font-size depending on the font sizes
defines in the config.theme.font.size stack

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: classes
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description: This mixin generate the documentation for the usage of the .s-format:... classes

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: text
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description:
This mixin allows you to scope some css that you want to apply only in text format context.
Your css will be scoped inside the "s-format:text" class.

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: classes
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description: This mixin generate all the gap helper classes like s-gap, s-gap:row, etc...

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: classes
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description: This mixin generate all the gradient helper classes like s-gradient:accent, etc...

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: gradient
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description: This mixin generate all the css needed to apply a gradient on your elements

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: classes
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description:
This mixin generate all the height helper classes like s-height:20, s-height:50, etc...
It will generate all the height defined in the config.theme.height configuration stack

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: theme
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description:
This mixin generate all the css needed to skin "Prism js"
with the theme colors

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: classes
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description:
This mixin generate all the classes needed to display the icons you've
passed as parameter.
The icons parameter define all the icons you want. Each line define a new icon and you can use these
different "adapters" to specify your icons:

- Line syntax: {adapter}:{name}:{nameYouWant}

Available adapters are:

- Filesystem:
Here's some example of filesystem icons declarations:

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: import
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description:
This mixin allows you to import other files just like the @import statement does.
It add the feature to specify a glob pattern to import multiple files at once.

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.sug.name: import
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.sug.description:
This mixin allows you to import files as default import statement does but add the glob support like "something/*
/.css"

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: init
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description:
This mixin is the one you usually call first in your css.
His job is to:
- Apply a reset.css to standardize the display across browser
- Generate the base theme variables like colors, etc...
- Generate all the font-faces needed

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: classes
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description: This mixin generate all the layout helper classes like s-layout:12, s-container, etc...

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: container
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description:
This mixin generate all the css needed for a container depending
on the config.theme.layout.container configuration stack

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: layout
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description: This mixin allows you to generate all the css needed for complex grids with multiple columns and rows like: |-|----|-| |--|--|--| |-----|--| The mixin accept 1 parameter called layout. Here's some simple layouts to illustrate how it works: - layout 1: '1 2 3 4 5 6' : This describe a simple 6 columns layout - layout 2: '1 1 2': This describe a two columns layout with the first columns taking 2/3 of the space and the second one taking 1/3 of it - layout 3: '1 2 _ 3 3': This describe 2 rows with the first having two columns and the second just one

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: classes
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description: This mixin generate all the height helper classes like s-link:stretch, etc...

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: stretch
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description:
This mixin allows you to stretch a link clickable area without having to change the actual link css.
It uses the `after` pseudo class to create a new clickable area that will spend until it reach an element that as a position specified.

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: base
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description:
This mixin apply some base look and feel depending on the current theme like:

- Page background using the <s-color="accent">background</s-color> theme color
- Text color using the <s-color="accent">default</s-color> theme color

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: selection
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description:
This mixin apply some base look and feel depending on the current theme like:

- Selection background and text color

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: classes
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description: This mixin generate all the margin helper classes like s-mie10, s-mis:40, etc...

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: classes
media
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description:
This mixin allows you to apply any media queries that are defined
in the config.theme.media.queries configuration stack like "tablet", "mobile", etc...

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: classes
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description: This mixin generate all the offwidt helper classes like s-os:30, s-osi:40, etc...

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: classes
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description: This mixin generate all the margin helper classes like s-opacity:10, s-opacity:40, etc...

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: classes
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description: This mixin generate all the order helper classes like s-order:1, s-order:2, etc...

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: outline
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description:
This mixin allows you to apply a nice outline on any HTMLElement.
This outline will be display on hover and focus by default but can be displayed
always by passing the `on` parameter to `always` like so `@sugar.outline(always)`

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: classes
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description: This mixin generate all the overflow helper classes like ```.s-overflow:hidden```, ```.s-overflow:auto```, etc...

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: classes
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description: This mixin generate all the padding helper classes like s-p:10, s-pie:40, etc...

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: classes
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description:
This mixin generate all the "platforms" css classes like s-platform:css, etc...
"Platforms" are some kind of "icons" of platforms like "css", "node", "js", "php", etc...

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: platform
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description:
This mixin generate all the css needed to display correctly a "platform" icon like
css, node, js, php, etc...

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: classes
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description: This mixin generate all the pointer helper classes like ```.s-pointer-events:none```, ```.s-pointer-events:all```, etc...

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: classes
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description: This mixin generate all the position helper classes like s-position:absolute, etc...

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: classes
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description:
This mixin generate all the ratio helper classes like s-ratio:16-9, s-ratio:1, etc.
The generated ratios are specified in the config.theme.ratio configuration stack

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: ratio
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description:
This mixin generate all the css needed to apply a ratio on any HTMLElement.
It uses the :before technique.

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: destyle
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description:
This mixin print the destyle css reset

@ƒeature       Reset from https://github.com/nicolas-cusan/destyle.css

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: reset
sugar
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description: This mixin print the sugar css reset that makes:

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: vertical
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description:
This mixin allows you to scope some css that you want to apply only in vertical rhythm context.
Your css will be scoped inside the "s-rhythm:vertical" class.

example.code:
Hello world

Hello world

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: classes
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description:
This mixin generate all the scale helper classes like s-scale:01, s-scale:12, etc.
The generated scales are specified in the config.theme.scale configuration stack

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: no
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description:
This mixin allows you to exclude some scope(s) from the generated css.
Scopes are usually "bare" or/and "lnf" (look and feel).
This is usefull for example if you want all the classes to apply bare styling
without any look and feel that you handle by yourself.

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: scrollbar
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description:
This mixin allows you to skin your scrollbar easily by applying a color and
a width to it.

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: shadow
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description:
This mixin allows you to apply a linear gradient shadow to any HTMLElement.
Note that this mixin make use of the :before pseudo class.

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: focus
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description:
This mixin allows you to target some active items to apply some styling on it.
Here's the selector generated by this mixin:
- &:active:not(:hover), &.active, &[active]

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: disabled
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description:
This mixin allows you to target some disabled items to apply some styling.
Here's the generated selector:
- &:disabled

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: hover
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description:
This mixin allows you to target some hover item to apply some styling on it.
Here's the generated selector:
- &:hover

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: classes
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description: This mixin generate all the text helper classes like s-text:center, s-text:left, etc...

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: theme
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description:
This mixin simply generate all the css needed for a theme to be applied
in any scope. It will print all the theme variables like colors, etc, as well
as set the correct font style and some other small things...

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: when
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description:
This mixin allows you to scope some css for a particular theme.
This will mainly scope your css under a class named ```.s-theme:{name}``` but it's
nice to use this mixin to make this easier and more modulable

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: classes
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description:
This mixin generate all the transition helper classes like s-transition:slow, etc.
The generated transitions are specified in the config.theme.transition configuration stack

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: transition
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description:
This mixin generate all the needed css to apply a transition setted in
the config.theme.transition configuration stack like "slow", "default" and "fast"

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.mix.name: transition
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.mix.description: This mixin allows apply a transition specified in the theme config like "fast", "slow" and "slow" or others you've been defined

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: classes
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description:
This mixin generate all the truncate classes like s-truncate, s-truncate:2, etc...
The number of truncate classes generated is defined in the theme.helpers.truncate.count settings

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: truncate
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description: This mixin allows you to truncate some text to a number of lines

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: classes
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description:
This mixin generate all the typo helper classes like s-typo:h1, s-typo:p, and all the typo
elements that are defined in the config.theme.typo configuration stack.

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.mix.name: classes
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.mix.description: This mixin allows you to print all the ui classes like button, form, etc...

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: classes
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description:
This mixin generate all the "until" classes that allows you to apply some display
styles like "hide", etc... only until a certain state is reached.
Supported states are:
- mounted: Apply only until the state of a webcomponent for example has been reached

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: mounted
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description:
This mixin allows you to set some css applied only UNTIL a specific "state" has been
reached.
Supported states are:
- mounted: When a sugar webcomponent has the "mounted" attribute

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: classes
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description: This mixin generate all the user-select helper classes like ```.s-user-select:none```, etc...

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: configToCss
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description:
This mixin allows you to pass a theme config dot path that point to an object
and to print out the result as css properties.

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: classes
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description: This mixin generate all the overflow helper classes like ```.s-visibility:hidden```, etc...

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: hidden
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description:
This mixin allows you to apply a css that make the element visually hidden but not really
hidden like when make use of `display: none;`.

transition.name: transition
transition.description: This mixin allows apply a transition specified in the theme config like "fast", "slow" and "slow" or others you've been defined

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: classes
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description: This mixin generate all the overflow helper classes like ```.s-visually:hidden```, etc...

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: classes
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description:
This mixin generate all the "when" classes that allows you to apply some display
styles like "hide", etc... only when a certain state is reached.
Supported states are:
- mounted: Apply only when the state of a webcomponent for example has been reached
- active: When the element has the "active" class or the "active" attribute

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: active
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description:
This mixin allows you to set some css applied only WHEN a specific "state" has been
reached.
Supported states are:
- mounted: When a sugar webcomponent has the "mounted" attribute
- active: When the element has the "active" class or the "active" attribute

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: classes
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description:
This mixin generate all the width helper classes like s-width:20, s-width:50, etc...
It will generate all the width defined in the config.theme.width configuration stack

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: avatar
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description: This mixin allows you to generate the "avatar" UI component css.

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: classes
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description: This mixin allows you to generate the "avatar" UI component classes.

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: badge
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description: This mixin allows you to generate the "badge" UI component css.

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.name: blockquote
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.nod.description: This mixin allows you to generate the "blockquote" UI component css.

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.ui..name: tabs
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.ui..description: Apply the tabs style to any element

style.description: Specify the style you want for your tabs

shape.description: Specify the shape you want for your tabs

grow.description: Specify if you want your tabs to take all the available place of not

direction.description: Specigy the direction of your tabs

outline.description: Specify if you want your tabs to have an outline on focus

scope.description: Specify the scope(s) you want to generate

@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.ui..name: tooltip
@coffeekraken.s-postcss-sugar-plugin.ui..description: Apply the tooltip style to any element
